title: Royal Poxes & Potions: The Lives of Court Physicians, Surgeons & Apothecaries
description: This book looks at the role of the royal doctor from the time of George I to the present day. It includes the drama of George II and his madness, Sir Frederick Treves who was involved with the "Elephant Man" Joseph Merrick, and Sir William Gull who remains a suspect in the Jack the Ripper case.
author: Raymond Lamont-Brown
